subtopicsString: Mathematical Definition of the DFT and IDFT, Properties of the DFT: Linearity, Periodicity, and Symmetry, Circular Convolution and its Relationship to Linear Convolution, Radix-2 Decimation-in-Time (DIT) FFT Algorithm, Radix-2 Decimation-in-Frequency (DIF) FFT Algorithm, Computational Complexity and Efficiency of FFT vs. DFT
